snippet.title: Fech The Ferret Alpha Teaser - a colorful parkour adventure
snippet.description:
A game about a pink ferret where the faster you go, the better music gets.
Try out the demo! 
https://playfe.ch

────────
Not sure if all of you know, but this is what keeps me busy most of my time. It's an open world parkour game heavily inspired by recent Sonic games. The game is now being developed by a small team taking the name of Aucritas (we're roughly 5 people) and we're getting close to releasing it in Alpha, on February 22nd 2022.
Feel free to check the game out and give me feedback if you wish!

Btw, Merry Christmas!
────────
All relevant links:

Website: https://playfe.ch
Discord of the game: https://playfe.ch/discord
Itch (demo): https://raoulwb.itch.io/fech-the-ferret
Steam (demo): https://store.steampowered.com/app/1382980/Fech_The_Ferret
Pre-alpha soundtrack: https://push.fm/fl/fechalbum
Twitter of the game: https://twitter.com/aucritas
My Twitter: https://twitter.com/RaoulWB
